alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gilmer; Ritchie (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, south central Ritchie and northwestern Gilmer Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grantsville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenville, Grantsville, Arnoldsburg, Cedar Creek State Park, Millstone, Big Springs, Stumptown, Tanner, Mount Zion, Annamoriah, Normantown and Burnt House. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
